    • Method Detail

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Testing only!!! Really!!!! This is only here to test when the client disconnects from the server w/o sending a session disconnect (ie ending the session cleanly). The server will eventually notice the client is no longer pinging and will timeout the session.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • dontReconnect

        public void dontReconnect()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Prevent the client from automatically reconnecting if the connection to the server is lost
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
